attributes.action: look into ways of improving public transport, rail, bus and tram services in the North West to ensure value for money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is designed to draw attention to the growing problem of public transport in the North West. 

Both trains and trams are frequently delayed and along with buses are overcrowded. The service is expensive and does not merit the cost which commuters are charged, considering such poor service.

We would like to petition the Prime Minister to investigate and put pressure onto local authorities into improving this situation, making public transport a more viable option.
